attributes.action: reinstate the Tripartite system across the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The comprehensive system is a failure: social mobility has reduced, since most intelligent kids are precluded from receiving an education befitting of their talents (unless they live near one of the remaining grammar schools or have wealthy parents).
Mixed-ability learning is not good for teachers or students at either extreme of the ability spectrum: the top end are not stretched and the bottom end struggle.
